summary: The Nobel Foundation  is a private institution started on 29 June 1900. Its job is to manage the money and organize the Nobel Prizes.
full_text:
The Nobel Foundation  is a private institution founded on 29 June 1900 to manage the finances and administration of the Nobel Prizes. The Foundation is based on the last will of Alfred Nobel, the inventor of dynamite.
It also holds Nobel Symposia on important breakthroughs in science and topics of cultural or social significance.
title: The Nobel Foundation
